word_mean: 砂囊：在消化开始前，专以机械磨碎食物的一部分消化道。在鸟类，是高度变异了的胃的后部，特征为有肌壁和分泌角质层的腺体。由前胃过来的食物，在其中借助于鸟吞下的砂砾，将其磨碎。某些无脊椎动物如昆虫的消化道内可见类似砂囊的器官

sentence.Network_en: But that fragment of talk lodged , thick, in his small gizzard.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是谈话的片断却深深盘据在他的小头脑里面.

sentence.Network_en: From here it travels to the muscular gizzard.
sentence.Network_cn: 从这里再转移到肌肉质的砂囊.

sentence.Network_en: It'sticks in my gizzard to do so.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 砂囊（Gizzard）是指鸟类和其他动物、例如蚯蚓、蚂蚱、小龙吓的消化器官。鸟类的砂囊有一层厚的、肌肉层，通常含有摄取的沙粒。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English giser: from Old French, based on Latin gigeria 'cooked entrails of fowl'. The final -d was added in the 16th cent

means.word_mean: 1. thick-walled muscular pouch below the crop in many birds and reptiles for grinding food
